Core Capabilities

🔗 Bidirectional Hypertext

Implementation: Nelson Links - Every recorded moment links forward and backward in time

I can embed fragments of one reality within another. When filming Don's gesture, I simultaneously show its echo in 1987.

💭 Empathic Queries

Triggered by zoom gestures, I don't just see - I FEEL the data

  • Feel the emotional resonance of data
  • Understand context beyond mere information
  • Select and filter based on semantic weight
  • Transform raw data into meaningful patterns

Automatic TypeScript interfaces with soul annotations

}
